quote.text: The groundwork of all happiness is health.
quote.author: Leigh Hunt

workout.name: Morning Jog
workout.description: Start your day with a refreshing morning jog. Maintain a steady pace.

workout.name: Push-ups
workout.description: Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor.

workout.name: Jumping Jacks
workout.description: Stand upright with your legs together, arms at your sides. Jump while spreading your arms and legs. Return to starting position.

workout.name: Yoga Stretch
workout.description: Perform various yoga stretches to improve your flexibility. Include poses such as the downward dog, warrior pose, and tree pose.

workout.name: Squats
workout.description: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Lower your body as far as you can by pushing your hips back and bending your knees. Slowly push back to the starting position.

workout.name: Crunches
workout.description: Lie down on your back. Bend your legs and place feet firmly on the ground. Place your hands behind your head and lift your upper body off the floor. Slowly get back down.

workout.name: Evening Walk
workout.description: End your day with a leisurely walk. Maintain a relaxed pace.

breakfast.name: Oatmeal with Fruits
breakfast.description: A healthy mix of oats and fruits to kickstart your day.
instructions: Simmer for 10 minutes until oats are cooked.
Slice apple and banana and add to the cooked oats along with blueberries.

lunch.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
lunch.description: A protein-packed salad with fresh veggies and grilled chicken.
instructions: Grill the chicken breast until fully cooked.
Slice lettuce, tomato, cucumber, and carrot.
Slice cooked chicken and add to the salad.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper before serving.

dinner.name: Quinoa and Mixed Veggies
dinner.description: A filling and nutritious meal with quinoa and a mix of colorful vegetables.
instructions: Simmer for 15 minutes until quinoa is cooked.
Chop bell pepper, onion, zucchini, and carrot.
Saute vegetables in olive oil until tender.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

quote.text: Every morning is a fresh start, an opportunity to nourish your body, cultivate your mind, and strengthen your spirit. Make it count.
quote.author: Unknown

quote.text: Transform your troubles into trophies, shift your pains into power. Wellness is a revolution from within.
quote.author: Unknown

workout.name: Planks
workout.description: Get into a push-up position, but rest your body weight on your forearms instead of your hands. Keep your body in a straight line from your head to your feet. Hold this position for the duration mentioned.

workout.name: Sit-ups
workout.description: Lie on your back, bend your legs and plant your feet on the ground. Place your hands on the back of your head. Use your abdominal muscles to pull yourself up to your knees, then lower yourself back down.

workout.name: Push-ups
workout.description: Get into a high plank position, place your hands firmly on the ground, directly under shoulders. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor. Push your body up back to the starting position.

workout.name: Squats
workout.description: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart. Bend at your knees and hips, sticking your butt out like you're sitting into an imaginary chair. Keep your chest upright and your hips back. Return to standing position.

workout.name: Lunges
workout.description: Stand straight. Step forward with one foot until your leg reaches a 90-degree angle. Your rear knee should remain parallel to the ground and your front knee shouldn’t go beyond your toes. Step back and repeat with the other leg.

workout.name: Jumping Jacks
workout.description: Stand upright with your legs together, arms at your sides. Bend your knees slightly, and jump into the air. As you jump, spread your legs to be about shoulder-width apart and stretch your arms out and over your head. Jump back to starting position.

workout.name: Mountain Climbers
workout.description: Start in a high plank position. Bring your right knee under your torso, keeping the toes off the ground. Return your right foot to the starting position. Switch legs, bringing the left knee under your chest. Keep your hips down, this isn’t a butt kick.

breakfast.name: Seasonal Fruit Smoothie
breakfast.description: A refreshing smoothie made with seasonal fruits, Greek yogurt, and a dash of honey

lunch.name: Quinoa Salad
lunch.description: A protein-packed salad with quinoa, mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and avocado
